hero.title: Collaborate with top creators
hero.subtitle: Work with brands & real companies. Start earning cash for what you love.

q1.question: What is Huerray?
q1.answer: Huerray is a platform that connects brands with creators to produce high-quality content.

q2.question: How do I get started?
q2.answer: Sign up for an account and create a campaign to start matching with creators.

q3.question: What kind of content can I get?
q3.answer: You can get a wide range of content, from social media posts to professional videos.

q4.question: How much does it cost?
q4.answer: The cost depends on the scope of your campaign and the creators you work with.

q5.question: How long does it take?
q5.answer: The timeline varies depending on the project, but you can typically get content within a few weeks.

q6.question: How do I pay creators?
q6.answer: Payments are handled securely through our platform. You can pay with a credit card or bank transfer.

q7.question: Can I use the content on my own channels?
q7.answer: Yes, you have full rights to use the content on your own marketing channels.

q8.question: What if I'm not happy with the content?
q8.answer: We have a revision process to ensure you're happy with the final product. If you're still not satisfied, we offer a money-back guarantee.

q9.question: How do you vet creators?
q9.answer: We have a rigorous vetting process to ensure that all creators on our platform are professional and produce high-quality work.

q10.question: Do you offer managed services?
q10.answer: Yes, we offer managed services for brands that want a more hands-off approach. Our team can handle everything from campaign strategy to creator management.

q11.question: I have another question
q11.answer: Please contact us at support@huerray.com for any other questions.
